abstract: Novartis has bought U.S.-based Protez Pharmaceuticals in a deal worth up to $400 million, Reuters reported. The deal would give Novartis rights to an antibiotic which could be used to fight superbugs such as MRSA, the Swiss drugmaker said.
lead_paragraph: Novartis has bought U.S.-based Protez Pharmaceuticals in a deal worth up to $400 million, Reuters reported. The deal would give Novartis rights to an antibiotic which could be used to fight superbugs such as MRSA, the Swiss drugmaker said.
